document_data.mainbody:
Yungric was a alchemist for hire from the city of Neverwinter, active in the late 15 century DR.
By the late 15 century DR, Yungric was known to be a stereotype of an old, mad, cackling alchemist. It was surprising that with all the mad concoctions, the mans eyebrows remained unsinged. Despite eccentricities, Yungrics skills as a miracle worker made his a popular alchemist for hire in Neverwinter.
